knimeNode.name: Slice Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop to process a subset of image slices at once.

fullDescription.intro: Slice loop start, each iteration processes another subset of image slices. The number of slices to process can be set as a fixed number. Only ImgPlus and Labelings columns are processed. All images/labelings in one row must have the same dimensions. The order of the columns must not be modified within the loop processing. The end of the loop is the slice loop end node.
fullDescription.option: The number of slices to process in one iteration.
Selection of columns to take into account.

outPort.name: Slices to process in the current iteration

ports.outPort: Slices to process in the current iteration
